name: philip-trauner.me
description: This is the code for my website. There's not much to see, really.

scripts.build: node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs static/script.js -o static/script.min.js && node_modules/uglifycss/uglifycss static/style.css > static/style.min.css && node_modules/html-minifier-cli/bin/htmlmin templates/index.html > templates/index.min.html

author: Philip Trauner
